name: Tusks of Fury
desc:
A multi-functional W- Engine specially designed with a motorcycle tire as the foundation. It boasts rapid speed, ferocious tearing power, solid defense, unexpectedly low energy consumption, and a domineering appearance. Apparently, this was initially just a toy that Big Daddy made for Caesar to play with, but every time Caesar played with it, it would end up in tatters. As a result, Big Daddy spent years reinforcing and modifying it over a hundred times, eventually creating this superb piece of equipment that can function as a weapon, shield, wheel, and even a light source.

<ct color=#959595>"It was originally supposed to also function as a piano, with keys embedded around the edge of the tire! But after a few tries, it didn't work out well. After spinning it a few times, I couldn't tell the correct notes apart, so I had to dismantle it... Fortunately, it can still be used as a fan when it gets hot." â€” Caesar, playfully flicking the W-Engine tire with her finger, whipping up a gust of wind.</ct>
desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A versatile W-Engine based on a motorcycle tire that Big Daddy made for Caesar.
phaseDescs: The Shield value provided by the equipper increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>30%</ct>. When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, all squad members' DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>18%</ct> and Daze dealt increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct> for 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

The Shield value provided by the equipper increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>38%</ct>. When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, all squad members' DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>22.5%</ct> and Daze dealt increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct> for 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

The Shield value provided by the equipper increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>46%</ct>. When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, all squad members' DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>27%</ct> and Daze dealt increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>18%</ct> for 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

The Shield value provided by the equipper increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>52%</ct>. When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, all squad members' DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>31.5%</ct> and Daze dealt increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>21%</ct> for 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

The Shield value provided by the equipper increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>60%</ct>. When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, all squad members' DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>36%</ct> and Daze dealt increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>24%</ct> for 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
